Download Data from Irish Weather Buoy Network ERDDAP Server

download_buoy_data.Rd

Downloads data from the Marine Institute's ERDDAP server for the Irish Weather Buoy Network. Supports filtering by date range, stations, and variables.

Usage

download_buoy_data(
  start_date = Sys.Date() - 30,
  end_date = Sys.Date(),
  stations = NULL,
  variables = NULL,
  format = "csv"
)

Arguments

start_date

Character or Date, start of date range (default: 30 days ago)

end_date

Character or Date, end of date range (default: today)

stations

Character vector of station IDs (default: all stations)

variables

Character vector of variable names (default: all variables)

format

Character, output format: "csv", "json", or "tsv" (default: "csv")

Value

Data frame containing the requested buoy data

Examples

# Get last 7 days of data for all stations
data <- download_buoy_data(
  start_date = Sys.Date() - 7,
  end_date = Sys.Date()
)
#> ℹ Downloading data from ERDDAP server...
#> ℹ URL: https://erddap.marine.ie/erddap/tabledap/IWBNetwork.csv?time,station_id,CallSign,longitude,latitude,AtmosphericPressure,AirTemperature,DewPoint,WindDirection,WindSpeed,Gust,RelativeHumidity,SeaTemperature,salinity,WaveHeight,WavePeriod,MeanWaveDirection,Hmax,Tp,ThTp,SprTp,QC_Flag&time%3E%3D2026-01-27T00:00:00Z&time%3C%3D2026-02-03T23:59:59Z
#> ℹ Downloading data from ERDDAP server...

#> ✔ Downloaded 895 records
#> ℹ Downloading data from ERDDAP server...

#> ✔ Downloading data from ERDDAP server... [338ms]
#> 

# Get specific variables for M3 buoy
wave_data <- download_buoy_data(
  stations = "M3",
  variables = c("time", "WaveHeight", "WavePeriod", "Hmax")
)
#> ℹ Downloading data from ERDDAP server...
#> ℹ URL: https://erddap.marine.ie/erddap/tabledap/IWBNetwork.csv?time,WaveHeight,WavePeriod,Hmax&time%3E%3D2026-01-04T00:00:00Z&time%3C%3D2026-02-03T23:59:59Z&station_id=~%22(M3)%22
#> ℹ Downloading data from ERDDAP server...

#> ✔ Downloaded 730 records
#> ℹ Downloading data from ERDDAP server...

#> ✔ Downloading data from ERDDAP server... [205ms]
#>
